greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,m) read by rows: m! if m <= floor(n/2), and (n-m)! otherwise.
mathematica: g[n_, m_] := If[m <= Floor[n/2], m!, (n - m)! ]; w = Table[Table[g[n, m], {m, 0, n}], {n, 0, 10}]; Flatten[w] Table[Apply[Plus, Table[g[n, m], {m, 0, n}]], {n, 0, 10}]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, May 30 2008
ext: Non-Ascii characters corrected, offset set to 0, reported Mma experiments removed - The Assoc. Editors of the OEIS, Oct 31 2009
